name: A night at Happy Cat's
description:
This is our submission for the FNAF 2021 gameJam!

Thx GoldCat Games for this amazing time, I hope you guys like the game!

Controls:

WASD - walk

T - Open tablet (Cameras)

F - move cabinet when looking at it (press again while looking at it to stop)

Minimum specs:

GTX 1050

Intel i5 6600k or amd ryzen 5 1400

probably or 2GB or so RAM

300mb storage

HEADPHONES!!!!

The Mac version has not been tested on a High-end machine.
